width=10%" Android": No2No, Some apps like Ad blockers are censored on Google Play but developers can distribute apps from their own sources
width=10%" iOS": No, Apple discriminates based on country and own Apple policies
width=10%" Windows 10 Mobile": No, Discriminates by country, manufacturer and type of application
width=10%" Sailfish OS": Openrepos. Developers can distribute apps from their own sources, supports multiple app stores

width=10%" Feature": !Common APIs for smartphones, tablets, and PCs

width=10%" BlackBerry 10": Windows, macOS, Linux (only Native SDK for 10+)

width=10%" Feature": Cost to develop for the mobile OS
Cost to publish app to official store
width=10%" Android": US$25 once to offer it on Google Play
width=10%" Windows 10 Mobile": US$19, once, for an individual; and $99 for a company account. Students can get a token for an individual account (1 token for 365 days) which gives free access to Windows Store/Phone Dev Center for 12 months.
